subSections.title: Definitions
Usage notes
subSections.text: In transcriptions of Buddhist terms, {{ltc-l|婆}} is often used to transcribe {{cog|sa|ब}}, {{m|sa|भ}} and {{m|sa|व}}.

subSections.title: Compounds
